# Drone News 48h Brief — September 19, 2025

_Window: last 48 hours; 87 incidents._

## Summary
Over the past 48 hours, a series of notable drone incidents have unfolded mainly revolving around Poland's tensions with Russia after drone incursions. Reports include a criminal scheme where drones were used to smuggle drugs and other items into prison yards. Additionally, various drone crashes were reported, particularly in Israel, where a Houthi drone caused damage to a hotel in Eilat. The proliferation of drone-related policies, including arrests stemming from unauthorized drone flights, has also gained attention, reflecting ongoing concerns about drone misuse in security contexts. The dual-use nature of drones has raised alarms about their potential impact on national security and civil order.

**By category:** arrest: 8 • crash: 12 • other: 53 • security: 1 • smuggling: 11 • terrorism: 2
**Top queries:** drone incident (31), drone crash (19), drone illegal (11), drone arrest (10), drone prison (9)
